attributes.action: give Ama Sumani a new Visa and bring her back to England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How can we watch a woman be condemmed to death because of where she's from. We have to bring her back to England because she cannot afford to receive cancer treatment and if not brought back she will certainly die.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
